title: Automate Your Savings: Set It and Forget It
excerpt: Learn how automatic transfers can help you build savings without thinking about it.
editorial_summary: This article explains how to set up automated savings transfers to build emergency funds and reach financial goals effortlessly. It covers direct deposit splits, recurring transfers, round-up apps, and how automation removes the mental friction of saving. Includes tips for choosing savings accounts, setting realistic transfer amounts, and gradually increasing savings over time.
